unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 – Music streaming saved us all from another year of questionable Bollywood remixes blaring from every Ganpati pandal! Insiders report a whopping 70% increase in streamed bhajans this festive season, proving even Ganpati Bappa prefers lossless audio.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty six – Music streaming saved us all from another year of questionable Bollywood remixes blaring from every Ganpati pandal! Insiders report a whopping seventy percent increase in streamed bhajans this festive season, proving even Ganpati Bappa prefers lossless audio.

unnormalised: Forget relying on your Chacha’s ancient RD Burman cassette collection – this year, even Grandma rediscovered AR Rahman on Spotify.
normalised: Forget relying on your Chacha’s ancient R D Burman cassette collection – this year, even Grandma rediscovered A R Rahman on Spotify.

unnormalised: Analysts at IIT Delhi are currently developing an algorithm to predict the next viral song based purely on wedding playlist data. Preliminary findings suggest "Tunak Tunak Tun" is still a strong contender, much to everyone's dismay (except maybe Daler Mehndi).
normalised: Analysts at I I T Delhi are currently developing an algorithm to predict the next viral song based purely on wedding playlist data. Preliminary findings suggest "Tunak Tunak Tun" is still a strong contender, much to everyone's dismay (except maybe Daler Mehndi).

unnormalised: A statement from Saregama India Ltd. acknowledged a slight dip in physical CD sales, adding, "But hey, at least we don't have to worry about scratched discs anymore, right? Time to invest in better headphones!"
normalised: A statement from Saregama India Limited acknowledged a slight dip in physical C D sales, adding, "But hey, at least we don't have to worry about scratched discs anymore, right? Time to invest in better headphones!"

unnormalised: So next time you’re stuck in a Borivali traffic jam, just remember, thanks to music streaming, at least you have control over the soundtrack of your suffering. We're all hoping that *Gully Boy 2* might inspire even more musical freedom, too.
normalised: So next time you’re stuck in a Borivali traffic jam, just remember, thanks to music streaming, at least you have control over the soundtrack of your suffering. We're all hoping that *Gully Boy two* might inspire even more musical freedom, too.
